name: Water Skinned
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Undines/New Racial Rules/Undine Feats/Water Skinned

sections.body: As a standard action, you can extinguish a small nonmagical fire with a touch, affecting anything up to the size of a large campfire. This ability does not affect fires with a total area greater than 5 square feet. Touching the fire in this way does not harm you.
sections.name: Benefit
